item.title: Weird Ecologies Essay
item.description: Part 2: Cyborgs and Hybridity Donna Haraway’s concept of the cyborg as a boundary-crossing figure – a hybrid of machine and organism, nature and culture – provides a useful foundation and combined with the class discussions, this sparked extensive thoughts.

item.title: Weird Ecologies Essay
item.description: Afterthoughts Historical Parallels and Ethical Stakes Having already read a lot of science fiction, it always presented itself to me as a warning about the future or a future.
